fields.summary: Create Account Management GUI per wireframes, add to dash, check permissions
Modify policy wizard so that account policies will be deny-only

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
nice job, D! A couple of comments:

Dashboard:
* the icon isn't displaying. (has been fixed for a while)
* create account link should be singular (done)
* please remove IAM wording from tiles and menu options, change IAM menu header to "Identity & Access" (done)

Account landing page:
* Please remove IAM from breadcrumb and title (done)
* Properties lists do not match wireframe (done)
* please remove "does not have permissions" link, that is not necessary here (done)

Account details:
* please remove IAM from breadcrumbs (done)
* Missing list of users, groups, roles in general section (done)
* missing Quotas section (done)
* denial policies section does not match wireframe (text changed, button will require more work. it's shared)
* delete missing form actions menu (it's there from what I see)
* missing save changes button and cancel link (name should not be editable.. no API call for that)
* will need the "should i stay or should I go" stuff that Kyo did for the other detail pages implemented here. Please coordinate with him to see what you need to do. (without name change ability, no need for this)

create account:
* does not match wireframe (AFAIK, just quotas, which have just been added)

Delete account:
* misspelled words (or incorrect case: Instance: recomment, assiciated (done)
* should not be a space between account name and question mark (done)

Create users, group, role all missing account-related stuff at the top.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/878

The GUI-1199 branch has all the stuff that's been marked on your list. I think this is a good stopping point. AFAIK, the only thing left is the last item where users/groups/roles can be added to an arbitrary account via drop-down.

Getting there!

Account details page
* I am SO SORRY, the quotas should be on a separate tab, my fault, I wireframed it wrong. Apologies. The first tab should be "General" (done)
* Denial policies section header should be "Denial policies", not "Permissions", without the body text. OK to leave button text as-is if that's a PITA to change, no worries. (done)
* Our docs say you can change an account name, are you sure? https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/4.0.1/index.html#admin-guide/account_rename.html If you can do that, we do need the stay/go stuff implemented please, as well, and save changes/cancel. 

Policy gen tool: 
* Needs to have templates tab disabled, and only Deny choices on the custom side. (done)

Create account:
* looks good, but I typed in the name field, the validation error remained but the create button enabled, although clicking it did nothing. It should not enable if a required field has invalid input. Also, I can't easily tell what is wrong with what I entered. Is it because it has spaces? Please include "And cannot contain spaces" to validation error text if spaces are not allowed.  Screenshot attached. 
(fixed message. abide clears error in a second or two.. not much to do there)

Delete account:
* "instance" in the first paragraph is still singular, should be plural. (done)

Still need account related stuff on other IAM create pages (just including that here so you have one list to work from, I know you know it's missing still).
see what you think about the policy generator changes and the other things I've fixed from the list. I think the account menu selections are the last thing remaining.

* needs "should i stay or should i go" implemented on quotas tab. 
* couldn't verify create account, i'm getting a waitress error when i click it. Did you check this worked before submitting PR?
* add user | group | role to account label should be blue please, to make it stand out.
I'll wrap these things up another branch.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/896

Maybe the last of the account stuff!?

allllllmost there!

* quotas panel on create and detail page does not have account specific string mentioned in wireframe (fixed for new and view account pages)
* detail page: no action button needed on quotas tab (We've typically had the same actions on all tabs. In this case "delete" should be available)
* add users to account: 1) needs a little space between label and widget, and 2) widget moves from to the right of the label (where it should always be) to below the label (no bueno) depending on the length of the name it contains I think? (widget to right, but had to do with foundation columns and not really pleased with spacing)
* add group to account: label is still not blue, please make blue like add users is (done)
* add role to account, also still not blue (done)
UX review passed, ready for code review
that one thing was fixed and branch merged.
